shrimp.name: FSNoise3D
shrimp.description: Filtered signed 3 dimensional Perlin noise function
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Filtered version of 3 dimensional signed noise. SNoise is exactly like Noise except that the result defaults to the range [-"amplitude","amplitude"] rather than [0,"amplitude"]. The average value is therefore zero. The parameter "amplitude" defaults to 1, so the noise range defaults to the range [-1,1].
